name: Eyevinn Open Source Cloud MCP Server
author: EyevinnOSC

server_configuration.name: OSC_ACCESS_TOKEN
server_configuration.description: Your Eyevinn Open Source Cloud Personal Access Token obtained from https://app.osaas.io/dashboard/settings/api

tools.name: osc_create_db
tools.description: Create and configure a new database instance (SQL, NoSQL, or MemoryDb) in the Eyevinn Open Source Cloud MCP Server using a structured input format.
tools.instructions: Create a new database instance in Eyevinn Open Source Cloud
tools.jsonSchema: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": { "name": { "description": "Name of the database", "pattern": "^[a-z0-9]+$", "type": "string" }, "type": { "description": "Type of database [SQL, NoSQL, MemoryDb]", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "name", "type" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: osc_create_bucket
tools.description: Create an S3-compatible bucket in Eyevinn Open Source Cloud using the MCP Server API, enabling efficient storage solutions for open web services.
tools.instructions: Create an S3 compatible bucket in Eyevinn Open Source Cloud

tools.name: osc_create_vod
tools.description: Generate a VOD package by processing a source video URL through a specified pipeline in the Eyevinn Open Source Cloud MCP Server.
tools.instructions: Create a VOD package using a VOD pipeline in Eyevinn Open Source Cloud
tools.jsonSchema: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": { "pipeline": { "description": "Name of the pipeline", "pattern": "^[a-z0-9]+$", "type": "string" }, "source": { "description": "Source video URL", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "pipeline", "source" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: osc_create_vod_pipeline
tools.description: Set up a video-on-demand (VOD) pipeline using Eyevinn Open Source Cloud MCP Server. Define pipeline name to create automated workflows for VOD content distribution and management.
tools.instructions: Create a VOD pipeline in Eyevinn Open Source Cloud

tools.name: osc_remove_vod_pipeline
tools.description: Removes a VOD pipeline from the Eyevinn Open Source Cloud MCP Server by specifying the pipeline name, enabling efficient management of media workflows.
tools.instructions: Remove a VOD pipeline in Eyevinn Open Source Cloud
